channel.title: How do I get more followers?
channel.description:
Okay so I’ve made a thread similar to this before but, my follower base is completely dead save maybe 7 or 8 people. This might be because I made the mistake of changing my name, I used to be Vulture. What is a guaranteed way to gain a decent following? I feel like my tracks deserve better.
[spoiler]Rip, I publicly said on discord I stopped caring[/spoiler]
[details="Summary"] [details="Summary"] I guess not [/details] [/details]

item.title: How do I get more followers?
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Katki:

How do you promote yourself if you don’t have social media(I feel like this is an impossible question sorry)

Too young for social media accounts?
I suspect you already realise that having social media will help significantly.
However, before social media, there was ‘being sociable’. There are likely other groups - both online and offline/IRL - that you can participate in.

It’s worth (re-?)reading @Arimyth’s worthwhile summary and get to work on the bits that are accessible to you now. The roll social media into your engagement and promotion activity when you can.

How do I get more followers? Branding & Distribution
This question has been asked so many times on this Discourse forum alone and the answer is always the same. Build yourself an engaged audience. Go interact with other artists, do repost trades, talk to people and get referrals from people bigger than yourself. People don’t come to you in the music industry or pretty much any industry, so it’s up to you to take the initiative. Extend the kind of support that you expect to be reciprocated to you. Stick to a more fixed track schedule. This is…

Read full topic

item.title: How do I get more followers?
item.dc:creator: Katki
item.description:
I don’t have many followers on SoundCloud but I don’t mind since I only just got it this month but so far almost all of my followers are either Auxy people or accounts that only repost (and they obviously just want you to follow them and stuff) Does anyone have tips on how to get real followers? I’d like to grow outside of reposters.

Read full topic
